summary: I am once again getting emails from people saying that Whatever arrives on their Feedly RSS reader sporadically if at all and when questioned about it, Feedly says that I am blocking them.  Feedly is lying to you, or at the very least is wildly extrapolating.  Not only am I not blocking Feedly, I specifically [â€¦]
title: Reminder: Feedly is Lying to You, I Am Not Blocking Them
